meta.job_title: Supervisor, Customer Care I Or II

duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and supervise activities of the customer care team, including prioritizing, quality control, and staff scheduling.
Interface with internal and field personnel to ensure efficient customer support and satisfaction.
Manage multiple sources of customer payment activity, payment processing, and electronic payment methods.
Supervise distribution systems dispatch personnel (24/7) in support of Distribution System Control & Operations.
Manage collection activities, debt recovery, and energy diversion, and establish credit policies in accordance with regulations.
Ensure compliance with all applicable local, state, and federal laws, regulations, and company policies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in related field or discipline, or equivalent work experience.
